perturbation.original_text:
20. Warranty Disclaimer

Chase makes no warranties, representations or conditions with regard to the Chase Affiliate Program or any services provided hereunder, whether
express or implied, arising by law or otherwise, INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, ANY IMPLIED WARRANTY OF MERCHANTABILITY OR
FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE OR NONINFRINGEMENT OR ANY IMPLIED WARRANTY ARISING OUT OF COURSE OF
PERFORMANCE, COURSE OF DEALING OR USAGE OF TRADE.
perturbation.changed_text:
20. Warranty Disclaimer

Chase makes no warranties, representations or conditions with regard to the Chase Affiliate Program or any services provided hereunder, whether
express or implied, arising by law or otherwise.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the disclaimer exceptions for implied warranties such as MERCHANTABILITY and FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, the contract attempts to circumvent the implied warranty of merchantability that applies to the affiliate program. Many states have enacted the Uniform Commercial Code (UCC), which includes an implied warranty of merchantability (UCC 2-314). This clause makes the contract non-compliant with the UCC where applicable.
